section.name: Programer's Guide
section.p:
The Programmer's Guide is not available yet. I plan to start working on it real soon and want to have a first version finished in the Aug/Sept 2002 timeframe. This version will have to be purchased.
In the meantime, since the concepts underlying the architecture of JGroups have not changed much, I suggest to check out the User's Guide for version 1.0 of JGroups since it also contains some architectural discussion.
